titleStmt.title: An exhortatyon or warnynge, to beware of greater plagues & troubles, then are yet come vppon thys realme, for the synnes and wyckednes that hath bene, & is yet dayly commytted there in..
titleStmt.author: Coucheman, Giles.

publicationStmt.publisher: in Paules Church yearde, at the sygne of the starre, by Thomas Raynalde],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer from colophon.
Imperfect: lacks B³-B⁵, E⁶; stained, tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in: Peterborough Cathedral.

place.placeName: Paules Church yearde, at the sygne of the starre
